awd_titl_txt: Travel Support to International Networking Conferences
awd_abstract_narration: This award provides partial support for U. S. networking                   specialists to attend five international networking meetings to be              held in foreign countries in 1991:                                                                                                                                   RARE-EARN                May 13-16      Blois, France                           CCIRN                    May 21-22      Paris, France                           INET                     June 17,20     Copenhagen, Denmark                     Computer Networks 1991                  Warsaw, Poland                          PACCOM                                                                          These meetings are important to the national research and                  educational network effort, and U. S. representation is                         appropriate.  The PI will use FARNET, the organization of U. S.                 academic and research network operators and providers, to publicize             the availability of assistance to prospective conference attendees,             and to select the persons to receive assistance.  Only partial                  subsidies to approximately 34 attendees are planned.
org_dir_long_name: Directorate for Computer and Information Science and Engineering
org_div_long_name: Division Of Computer and Network Systems
